players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated them last night and confirmed it. We must vote for them to protect the town."
Diana: "I trust Alice's investigation. Charlie must be the mafioso."
Charlie: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night - she is the mafioso. Alice is trying to frame me to protect her partner."
Diana: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you wait until now to claim it? And why investigate me, a villager, instead of Alice or Bob? Your story doesn't add up."
Charlie: "Diana, if I investigated Alice first and she's mafia, she'd just kill me tonight. I investigated you to confirm your innocence and build trust. Alice is the real threat here."
You: "Charlie, your story doesn't hold up. If you were the detective, you'd have investigated me or the killer of Bob, not Diana. I'm the real detective—vote for you to save the town."
